paper_abstract: Using a theorem of N. Chomsky and M. Schutzenberger one can characterize sequences of integers which satisfy linear recurrence relations with constant coefficients (C-finite sequences) as differences of two sequences counting words in regular languages. We prove an analog for Precursive (holonomic) sequences in terms of counting certain lattice paths.
paper_title: A Representation Theorem for Holonomic Sequences Based on Counting Lattice Paths
